title: Benchmarking Fake News
description: An R markdown case study examining the ability to automate identifying metrics or key indicators whether text-based media is misinforming the public.

title: Identifying Misinformation in the Media

tags: R; Fake News; Misinformation; Text Mining; Machine Learning
